questions.text: What famous criminal did Supergirl mention never got to meet her?
questions.explanation:
Pretty Boy Floyd.

	Supergirl burst into a bank and pulled two robbers out while Maggie and the police were trying to talk them out of the bank. She mentioned to them as they were being arrested that it would be a good story to tell their prison roommates and that not even Pretty Boy Floyd got to meet Supergirl.

questions.text: Who got into an argument with Kara?
questions.explanation:
Maggie.

	Maggie told Kara that Supergirl wasn't a good crime fighter when it came to non-super powered villains. She said that many criminals use the Supergirl defense to get out of jail, saying that excessive force and a vigilante were used to make the arrest.

Alex.

	Kara was called by Alex's phone and a man on the other end send her a photo claiming to have Alex. He said that he knew she was Supergirl and demanded that she break a man out of prison or Alex would be killed.

questions.text: The villain of the week was from Alex and Kara's hometown.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He was in the same graduating class as Kara at Midvale High School. Based on growing up near her and then seeing her powers in action, he had figured out who she was and tried to get her to break his father out of prison. He told Maggie that he had been planning the kidnapping for a year.

questions.text: Who tried to give Lena Luthor designs to build a matter transporter?
questions.explanation:
Rhea.

	Rhea, posing as a human scientist, tried to work out a deal with Lena to build the machine. During dinner Rhea thanked "the gods" which triggered Lena to investigate her and find out that she was an alien. Rhea is Mon-El's mother and the queen of Daxon.

questions.text: Alex was killed during a fight with a villain.
questions.explanation:
False.

	After she was kidnapped, the cell she was held in started to fill up with water as the villain triggered a fail safe when they tried to save her. The room was set to fill with water in 4 hours, cutting down the 23 hours they had left to save her.  She was saved with a moments to spare before the episode ended.

questions.text: Which main character didn't appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
James.

	James was one of the main characters in the first and second seasons of the show, though during the second season there were several episodes where he failed to appear. Once Kara became a reporter and he became the head of CatCo, he was busy running a company and they no longer worked side-by-side as much.

questions.text: Who told Maggie and Kara where Alex was being kept?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	Peter Thompson was in prison for two murders as well as other crimes. He was the father of Alex's kidnapper, Rick. In the end they managed to convince Peter to reveal where Alex would be kept just in time to save her life. Peter was played by Gregg Henry.

questions.text: Which couple said "I love you" for the first time?
questions.explanation:
Alex/Maggie.

	Alex said it first and Maggie said it back to her. The scene happened just after Alex woke up in a hospital bed after being rescued from nearly drowning. The moment was quick and to the point, pivoting quickly to Alex punching Rick in the face before he was sent off to have his mind wiped.

questions.text: Who thanked Kara at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Maggie.

	"We both love her," Kara told Maggie after she thanked Kara for stopping her from making a mistake. Maggie had been about to release Rick's father from prison in exchange for Alex's freedom.
